name: Frontier Airlines Airbus 321 Morning Flight (FT609): Indianapolis to Denver
description:
Welcome!  This is a full flight video aboard Frontier Airlines Flight 609 with nonstop service from Indianapolis International Airport to Denver International Airport aboard an Airbus 321, Courtney the Cougar.

After driving away from Louisville, Kentucky a bit before 2:00 AM, I arrived at Indianapolis International around 4:00 for a very early morning flight.  I wanted to fly out of Indianapolis for three reasons: first, I never had flown Frontier and I'd never flown out of Indy before.  Second, no cheap flights exist from Louisville to Denver, and third, Indianapolis International has been consistently voted one of the best airports in the country and I wanted to see why!

Frontier Airlines is an ultra-low-cost carrier where you purchase each extra from seat selection to carry-on baggage.  My only interest is getting there safely, on-time, and in a window seat, so that's all I paid for.  The flight was spartan, but we took off and landed as scheduled.  Couldn't ask for anything else!

This video covers the KIND terminals, boarding process, pushback and taxi, take-off, sunrise, approach, and landing.
 
Thanks again for watching, and enjoy!

--------------------------------

Flight Information
Airline: Frontier
Flight Number: FT609
Date of Flight: Tuesday, September 27, 2016

Origin Airport: Indianapolis International Airport (KIND/IND)
Destination Airport: Denver International Airport (KDEN/DEN)

Departing Gate: B15
Scheduled Departure: 06:05 EDT
Actual Departure from Gate: 06:08 EDT
Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 23R / 06:16 EDT
Landing Runway and Time: RWY 16L / 06:36 MDT
Scheduled Arrival: 06:49 MDT
Actual Arrival at Gate: 06:54 MDT
Arriving Gate: A46

--------------------------------

Aircraft Information
Name: Courtney the Cougar
Type: Airbus 321-211
Registration: N702FR 
Aircraft Delivery: October 2015
Engines: 2x CFM International 56-5B3
Seat: 9F

--------------------------------

Video Highlights and Timeline
00:15 - KIND Concourse A
00:55 - KIND Concourse B and Boarding
01:35 - Seat Tour
01:55 - Pushback and Taxi
03:45 - Takeoff
06:00 - First Sunlight
06:30 - Approach
08:20 - Landing

--------------------------------

Gear
Nikon D3200/18-55mm lens
LP Microphone
GO PRO Hero
